content: the pattern is currently only available in **norwegian** islenderen går aldri av moten denne versjonen har raglanfelling med en dekorativ bord i midten genseren er en kort modell men kan gjerne strikkes lengre om du ønsker det \ the icelander sweater never goes out of style this version has raglan sleeves with a decorative pattern between the decreases the sweater is a short model but can be lengthened if desired just knit until desired length before binding off for the armholes
